notification_level.description: The level of notification settings for the conversation.

unique_name.description: A unique name assigned to the conversation.

user_sid.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the conversation.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name or alias for the conversation.

conversation_sid.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

unread_messages_count.description: The count of unread messages in the conversation.

created_by.description: The user or entity that created the conversation.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the Twilio account the conversation belongs to.

last_read_message_index.description: The index of the last message in the conversation that has been read by the user.

date_created.description: The date and time when the conversation was initially created.

timers.description: Contains timers or time-related information for the user conversation.

chat_service_sid.description: Additional timer related to the chat service.

url.description: The URL to access the conversation details.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the conversation was last updated.

attributes.description: Additional metadata or attributes associated with the conversation.

participant_sid.description: The unique identifier of the participant in the conversation.

conversation_state.description: The current state or status of the conversation.

chat_service_sid.description: The unique identifier of the chat service associated with the conversation.

links.description: Contains links related to the user conversation data.

conversation.description: Link to access detailed information about the conversation.

participant.description: Link to access participant information related to the conversation.
